page.title: 15THE INDUCTION __ continued.
page.content:
tired.I said to Mummy,"There isn't this many on Sundays."The church is full because there were a lot of people who wanted to see the new vicar.The vicar is nice because he is new.The vicar went to the door that you come in by,then he went to the bell.He rang the bell.He went to the font where Timothy was christened.We laughed at some jokes the bishop told us.After the service we went to the village hall and I had a cup of orange.Mummy had a cup of tea.I had some ham sandwiches and a bun with white icing on it.The food was nice.I saw the vicar,Mr.Trill again.Then we went home.I think it was nine o'clock. Then I went to bed.
______________________________________
